title: The Maiden of Iverny
description: A war-scared knight struggles to conquer his inner demons and earn the heart of a mysterious lady, but first he must save her from the vengeance of his former friend.England 1265- The War of the Baron’s is over, but Sir Geoffrey Fleming is still haunted by it and Lady Magdalena LeMoyne is trying to survive in the aftermath. When Geoffrey and his childhood friend Sir Thomas seek refuge at her castle, Geoffrey becomes intrigued with the secretive lady. Maggie publicly wounds Thomas’ pride. In revenge he hatches a plot to ruin her. As Geoffrey and Maggie face the perils that follow, they both find that not all wounds are visible.Can Maggie learn to trust? Will Geoffrey let God heal his heart? And can they redeem Thomas before he destroys everything they hold dear?
author: Marta Northcutt
